channel.title: INsmh
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INsmh, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 'I'm a hair expert - stop frizziness in warm weather with one clever trick'
item.description: Leading haircare specialist Anabel Kingsley has shared her top tips on how to keep your hair looking sleek and shiny as the seasons change and the war...

item.title: Parents' top 20 biggest irritations on family road trips
item.description: A study of 1,500 regular road-tripping parents of kids under 16 found the question 'Are we there yet?' is asked five times on a typical journey which ...

item.title: Devastated mum relives moment she finds two of her kids dead in bed after 'fentanyl overdose'
item.description: WARNING: DISTRESSING CONTENT: Kate Jones found her two oldest children, Gaige, 10, and Skylar, 14, both unresponsive in bed just hours after they watc...

item.title: Mum's tragic final two words to daughter as she lay dying after husband murdered her with axe
item.description: Nelomie Perera’s estranged husband Dinush Kurera was waiting for her in the back garden, where we she was ambushed and murdered when she stepped out f...

item.title: Longevity expert says eat 3 of these Blue Zone-inspired foods daily to 'live to 100'
item.description: These foods are inspired by the diets of people who live the longest in the world

item.title: Student so scared of DIY he paid tradesman £180 to change batteries
item.description: Sam Daley also says he doesn’t want to speak to anyone on the phone and he lacks the confidence to negotiate so sourced the tradesman through an app.

item.title: Nine English words you probably didn’t know came from Irish
item.description: Some common words we use every day, including the name of one of the UK's main political parties, have a surprising origin in Irish.

item.title: ‘New Nostradamus’ made eerie prediction about an oil tanker explosion days before it happened
item.description: 'I saw a ship or something in trouble.'

item.title: Man claims he was shot by his dog while lying in bed
item.description: The Memphis man was 'relaxing/talking' in bed when the incident occurred

item.title: Who is Mark Carney? New Canadian PM’s family, career, and more
item.description: Mark Carney met his English wife Diana when they were both members of the Oxford University Ice Hockey Club.
